SEARCH
Package basepack

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
basepack.Reservation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Reservation extends Object implements Serializable
The Reservation class represents a reservation made by a guest.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reservation(String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut, Room room, String[] breakdown)
    Constructs a Reservation instance with the specified guest name, check-in and check-out dates, and room.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getCheckIn()
    The getCheckIn() method returns the checkIn value of the reservation.
    int
    getCheckOut()
    The getCheckOut() method returns the checkOut value of the reservation.

    getGuestName()
    The getGuestName() method returns the guestName value of the reservation.
    String[]
    getReservationBreakdown()
    The getReservationBreakdown() method returns the breakdown of the reservation.
    Room
    getRoom()
    The getRoom() method returns the room object.
    double
    getTotalPrice()
    The getTotalPrice() method calculates the total price for a stay based on the base price of the room for each night between the check-in and check-out dates.
    String[]
    printReservation()
    The printReservation() method prints out details of a guest's reservation including guest name, stay length, room details, and total price.
    void
    setTotalPrice(int promoValidity, int checkIn, int checkOut)
    The setTotalPrice() method sets the total price of the reservation after applying any discounts.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut, Room room, String[] breakdown)
      Constructs a Reservation instance with the specified guest name, check-in and check-out dates, and room.
      Parameters:
      guestName - The name of the guest.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.
      room - The room associated with the reservation.
      breakdown - The breakdown of the reservation.

  • Method Details

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice()
      The getTotalPrice() method calculates the total price for a stay based on the base price of the room for each night between the check-in and check-out dates.
      Returns:
      The total price for the room for the duration of the stay.

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom()
      The getRoom() method returns the room object.
      Returns:
      The Room object to where the reservation belongs to.

    • getCheckIn

      public int getCheckIn()
      The getCheckIn() method returns the checkIn value of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The checkIn int value.

    • getCheckOut

      public int getCheckOut()
      The getCheckOut() method returns the checkOut value of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The checkOut int value.

    • getGuestName

      public String getGuestName()
      The getGuestName() method returns the guestName value of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The guestName String value.

    • printReservation

      public String[] printReservation()
      The printReservation() method prints out details of a guest's reservation including guest name, stay length, room details, and total price.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the reservation details.

    • setTotalPrice

      public void setTotalPrice(int promoValidity, int checkIn, int checkOut)
      The setTotalPrice() method sets the total price of the reservation after applying any discounts.
      Parameters:
      promoValidity - The validity period of the promotion.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.

    • getReservationBreakdown

      public String[] getReservationBreakdown()
      The getReservationBreakdown() method returns the breakdown of the reservation.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the breakdown of the reservation.
